document.full_text: forces loyal to alassane ouattara seized the capital of ivory coast and advanced toward the coastal cities of abidjan and san pedro on wednesday, in a dramatic push aimed at toppling incumbent leader laurent gbagbo.
document.title: pro-ouattara forces take ivorian capital
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to alassane ouattara seized the capital of ivory coast and advanced toward the coastal cities of abidjan and san pedro on wednesday, in a dramatic push aimed at toppling incumbent leader laurent gbagbo.
